TopicTitle: Why is my command pod overheating RSS/RP-1

Articles.Content:
I recently got the contract for first crewed orbit, and made a relatively simple 8km/s DV rocket (I know its not enough for an orbit). I reenter the atmosphere at ~6000m/s, and my heatshield seems to be doing absolutely NOTHING.

https://imgur.com/a/OZLjiOO
Your heatshield is setup as a heatsink not a heatshield
